alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie; Riley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 6:58PM CDT until April 19 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GEARY...SOUTHWESTERN RILEY AND WESTERN POTTAWATOMIE COUNTIES... At 658 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tuttle Creek Lake, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. at 657 pm, Law enforcement reported ping pong sized hail near Olsburg. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Manhattan, Junction City, Westmoreland, Ogden, Grandview Plaza, Olsburg, Milford Lake, Keats and Tuttle Creek Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 295 and 305. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
